ComicInfo.Summary:
"WE ALL FLOAT ON," Part Two
Richie Pike is on the run from Royal City and from himself as he faces the demons of his past. Meanwhile, Patti and Pete reconcile in the most unexpected way. JEFF LEMIRE's multi-generational family saga continues, and the Pike family heads toward a reckoning 20 years in the making.
Note: The digital edition (6/27/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Title: We All Float On, Part Two
